name: Lizard
overview: Lizard is a shoot 'em up game. Planets of the Reptilian System have formed an alliance to conquer the Earth. Each of the planetary systems is governed by a Tyrant Beast and protected by a force field powered by solar panels. To defeat the commanders of the planets, the player character must destroy the solar collectors. To accomplish that, the protagonist must fight waves of enemies that appear on the right or left side of the screen.
